name: Libre Zoo
description:
Select one of the 3 languages available: Spanish, Portuguese and English. The game features voice acting: No text!


Use the mouse/touchpad to customize your character, and then use WASD/arrow keys to move on the zoo.

Search for the keys that will open the animal cages. Be careful with the guards. If you get caught, press M (Just to see the ending video) and press CTRL to continue playing.

Press space once you have stones to throw them to distract the static guard. And, if you see a security camera, can something deactivate it?

Can you find the halloween easter egg?
